name: Lake Of Horrors
description:
Arrow Keys - Move the fishing rod Z - Hold to reel in fish once on the hook X - Store caught fish in the boat / Unhook fish

Survive the night and catch as many fish as possible, whilst avoiding piranhas that will eat them!

Look out for puddles to show where fish are swimming.

Rare fish get more points, and losing fish to piranhas loses points.

Made for Ludum 41 a long time ago, never uploaded it to itch until now!
